channel.title: How to change the max skill to 180?
channel.description: i need help changing the max skill from 99 to 180 and making the xp rate easier to use can sombody please help me????????

item.title: How to change the max skill to 180?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Jagex calculations cant go higher than 536,870,911, but Exp will stop at 200,000,000 anyway(unless you change it.)

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the max skill to 180?

item.title: How to change the max skill to 180?
item.dc:creator: @deathbyu deathbyu
item.description:
@deathbyu wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:8, topic:343754”][quote author=deathbyu link=topic=440141.msg3234450#msg3234450 date=1276368891]

[quote] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;
if (exp > 13034430)
return 99;
for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0
* Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);

		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}[/quote]

Blue - Exp to max level
Red - Max level

well where would i put it or where could i find it??? in client java and whats the thing abve it???
[/quote]He meant to change the code that was already there…[/quote]

ohh kk i found it but what is the xp for the skill level 180???

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the max skill to 180?

item.title: How to change the max skill to 180?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:4, topic:343754”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=440141.msg3234331#msg3234331 date=1276361282]
I would like to point out that the max exp is 510,000,000 which makes the highest possible level 136. Anything above that will reset that skill back to 1.
[/quote]
Seemed to work for me though
[/quote]Must be only 508’s then.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change the max skill to 180?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); 
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}</blockquote>

Blue - Exp to max level
Red - Max level

Read full topic
